recordTypes.name: Special Events License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a special events license through the City/Town of XXX.

recordTypes.name: Short-Term Rental Registration
recordTypes.description:
Application for a Short-Term Rental Registration 

New Shoreham General Ordinance, Chapter 8 Licenses, Article XII Residential Short-Term Rental, Sections 8-320-8-331

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Review Application
recordTypes.description: Application to the Zoning Board of Review for consideration of request for Special Use Permit and Dimensional Variance.

recordTypes.name: Municipal Fire Alarm Registration/Renewal/Caretaker Form
recordTypes.description:
Town of New Shoreham Municipal Fire Alarm Registration Form

This form can be used to enter a new subscriber into the list of monitored businesses, to modify existing subscriber data in any way (e.g. contact ID list of responder contacts), or, for existing subscribers, to switch from a Digitize Radio Box to an AES RF Subscriber.

recordTypes.name: Change of Use
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Change of Use from Town of New Shoreham

recordTypes.name: Excavation Permit Application (Road Cuts)
recordTypes.description: Application for Excavation of Road Cut for Town or State roads located in Water and/or Sewer Districts.

recordTypes.name: Physical Alteration Permit (Driveway Cut on Town Road)
recordTypes.description:
This permit applies to Driveway Road Cuts on Town Roads only.
You must fill out an Excavation Permit Application if you are performing a road cut that is on a State Road.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building permit from the Town of New Shoreham, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an electrical permit from the Town of New Shoreham.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a mechanical permit from the Town of New Shoreham, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a plumbing permit from the Town of New Shoreham, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit from the Town of New Shoreham.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a sign permit from the Town of New Shoreham. All permit applications should include photos of any existing signage.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit (Photo-Voltaic only, pull building permit for solar hot-water)
recordTypes.description: Apply for a solar permit from the Town of New Shoreham.

categories.name: Short-Term Rental Registration. Zoning and Planning Departments
